patthana20.2:4.1: Naappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:6.1: Naasaṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:8.1: Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:8.2: Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:8.3: Nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:8.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana20.2:9.1: Nasanidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana20.2:10.1: Nasanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.2:10.2: Naanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana20.2:11.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare ekaṃ, sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke … pe … magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.2:12.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:12.2: Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:12.3: Nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana20.2:13.1: Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:13.2: Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:13.3: Naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho ca appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana20.2:14.1: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.2:15.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.2:16.1: Narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:17.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.2:18.1: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:18.2: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:18.3: Nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana20.2:19.1: Nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana20.2:20.1: Nalokiyañca nalokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.2:21.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.2:22.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
